title: Kirchhoff junction - 120 V 15 A source - find R

content.question: A <math alttext="120 volt" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>120</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi></math> source of <math alttext="e m f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>emf</mi></math> is connected to two resistors in a circuit as shown. The total current supplied by the source is <math alttext="15 amps" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>15</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></math>, and one of the resistors has a resistance of <math alttext="24 oms" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>24</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">Ω</mi></math> as indicated. What is the resistance <math alttext="R" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>R</mi></math> of the resistor in the middle branch of the circuit?

choices.label: <math alttext="8 ohms" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>8</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">Ω</mi></math>
<math alttext="10 ohms" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>10</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">Ω</mi></math>
<math alttext="12 ohms" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>12</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">Ω</mi></math>
<math alttext="16 ohms" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>16</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">Ω</mi></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="12 ohms" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>12</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">Ω</mi></math>

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
